info.title: Torrust-Actix API Debugger
info.description: This swagger debugger page, is used for documentation and testing of the Torrust-Actix API service. Use this page to test and see how the API responses on requests, which can be used for your website or application.

get.summary: Get torrent data with a hash (in HEX).

post.summary: Post torrent data with a hash (in HEX).

delete.summary: Delete torrent data with a hash (in HEX).

get.summary: Get torrents data with a hash list in the body. If you get an error on execution about BODY not allowed in GET method, this is false and is a limitation of Swagger. Use the cURL command to see what happens.

400.description: Invalid info_hash or errors on handling body data.

post.summary: Post torrents data with all data in the body.

delete.summary: Delete torrents data with a hash list in the body.

400.description: Invalid info_hash or errors on handling body data.

get.summary: Get whitelist data with a hash list in the body. If you get an error on execution about BODY not allowed in GET method, this is false and is a limitation of Swagger. Use the cURL command to see what happens.

400.description: Invalid info_hash or errors on handling body data.

post.summary: Post whitelists data with all data in the body.

delete.summary: Delete torrents data with a hash list in the body.

400.description: Invalid info_hash or errors on handling body data.

delete.summary: Delete key data with a hash (in HEX).

post.summary: Post key data with a hash (in HEX).

get.summary: Get user data with a hash (in HEX).

delete.summary: Delete user data with a hash (in HEX).

post.summary: Post user data with a hash (in HEX).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: This is either a UUID or ID number.

parameters.name: key
parameters.description: This is a SHA1 hash in HEX (40 characters).

parameters.name: uploaded
parameters.description: This a number how much in Bytes has been uploaded in total by the user.

parameters.name: downloaded
parameters.description: This a number how much in Bytes has been downloaded in total by the user.

parameters.name: completed
parameters.description: This a number how many times in total downloads has been completed by the user.

parameters.name: updated
parameters.description: This is a UNIX timestamp in seconds when user was active for the last time.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: A simple 0 or a 1 if a user account is supposed to be active or not.

get.summary: Get users data with a hash list in the body. If you get an error on execution about BODY not allowed in GET method, this is false and is a limitation of Swagger. Use the cURL command to see what happens.

400.description: Invalid user_hash or errors on handling body data.

post.summary: Post users data with all data in the body.

delete.summary: Delete users data with a hash list in the body.

400.description: Invalid user_hash or errors on handling body data.
